scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run compose:up && dotenv -e .env.test.e2e -- npx prisma migrate deploy && dotenv -e .env.test.e2e -- npx prisma generate && npm run prisma:seed && dotenv -e .env.test.e2e -- jest --selectProjects integration --runInBand; npm run compose:down
scripts.test:e2e: npm run compose:up && dotenv -e .env.test.e2e -- npx prisma migrate deploy && dotenv -e .env.test.e2e -- npx prisma generate && npm run prisma:seed && dotenv -e .env.test.e2e -- jest --selectProjects e2e --runInBand; npm run compose:down
